events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision and damages sustained.
An insurance agent was assigned to this auto accident claim to guide the customer through the submission and investigation processes.
The customer received an acknowledgment confirming that the vehicle accident claim was successfully received and is now in process.
The customer was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and witness statements related to the collision incident.
All required documents, including the accident photos, police report, and witness statements, were provided by the customer on time.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and details surrounding the car collision to assess liability and damages.
The investigation concluded that the accident was caused by the other driver who ran a red light, confirming fault for the claim.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the full repair costs for the vehicle damage and reimbursement for the towing fees.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt communication from the claims team.
The claim was officially approved, confirming that the customer will receive reimbursement following the agreed settlement terms.
Insurance payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account promptly to cover the vehicle repair expenses.
The claim file has been closed after payment was made and the customer confirmed that vehicle repairs were completed successfully.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived for record-keeping purposes as the auto accident claim was fully resolved.
